features: Abrasion-resistant nylon for durability; Lightweight and breathable with stretch for comfort and mobility
Quick-drying fabric; Environmentally conscious PFC-free DWR (Durable Water-Repellent) finish repels water from the surface fabric
Sun protection with an ultraviolet protection factor (UPF) of 50
Main materials: 94% Nylon 6% Elastane Stretch Dobby 3.7 oz/ yd
